original_text: King Sihon's land also went along the east side of the Jordan Valley from the sea of Galilee to the Salt Sea. His land went south to Beth Jeshimoth and as far as Pisgah mountain.
korean_text: 또 동방 아라바 긴네롯 바다까지이며 또 동방 아라바의 바다 곧 염해의 벧여시못으로 통한 길까지와 남쪽으로 비스가 산기슭까지이며

sentences.original_text: King Sihon's land also went along
sentences.korean_translation: 시혼 왕의 땅 또한 따라 나아갔습니다

sentences.original_text: the east side of the Jordan Valley
from the sea of Galilee to the Salt Sea
His land went south to Beth Jeshimoth
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 땅은 남쪽으로 벧 예시못까지 뻗어 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: and as far as Pisgah mountain
